name: Calories Burner - The Game
description:
Calories Burner - The Game! is a stressful avoid-the-projectiles game where you play as a fat dude on a diet trying to burn calories. Jump around, run and avoid the fat foods that come from all the direction to reach the lowest calorie score possible.

This game was made by LordCloud (me) for the Butterscotch shenanijam.

Have fun!

Special thanks for NoodleSushi for making the music! (SoundCloud: NoodleSushi)
